Name: Slow Comfortable Screw Between the Sheets
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: The rum and cognac combo from Between the Sheets served as part of the Slow Comfortable genre. As with so many of the Slow Comfortable family of cocktails, when made with freshly squeezed orange juice, this is a tasty, fruity and balanced long drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Slow Comfortable Screw Between the Sheets contains 218 calories
